etomica.nbr.cell.molecule

Class MpiAACell

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.nbr.cell.molecule.MpiAACell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoleculesetIteratorCellular, java.io.Serializable

    public class MpiAACell
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoleculesetIteratorCellular, java.io.Serializable
    Returns iterates formed from all cell-based neighbor pairs.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • MpiAACell

        public MpiAACell(int D,
                 double range,
                 IBox box)
        Constructor makes iterator that must have box specified and then be reset() before iteration.
        Parameters:
        D - the dimension of the space of the simulation (used to construct cell iterators)
        range - the distance within which pairs of atoms are considered neighbors. Used to define neighbor cells; some iterates may exceed this separation
